file_content.text: Satellite defenses powering up. This battle is about to end.
The enemy has nearly complete control. We need those satellites!
The defense network is almost ours. Maintain control!
Satellite secured.
Enemy has taken a satellite!
Fleet Admiral Aygo to attack squadron: You're approaching a critical repair outpost for enemy forces in this region. Your objective is to capture and hold.
Fleet Admiral Aygo to wargame participants: This exercise simulates an assault on an enemy repair outpost. Objective is to capture the outpost's defensive satellites.
We have satellite access.
Satellite captured.
Satellite lost.
We have lost a satellite.
We're running out of time! The network's almost at full power!
Don't quit fighting. We can still win this!
We can win this one--just maintain control!
Satellite secured!
Defense satellite active.
Satellite defended.
We just lost a satellite!
The enemy's taking control!
Satellite lost!
Admiral Ranken to all ships. This repair outpost is critical to our operations in this region. It must not fall into enemy hands.
Admiral Ranken to all ships. This is a live fire wargame simulating the defense of a critical repair outpost.
Each of the outpost's defensive satellites must be secured and patrolled until our technicians have activated their systems. Watchwords are "swift" and "absolute."
Republic forces are in-system and will attempt to intercept. Break formation, fire at will, and hold this outpost for the Empire.
Your objective is to secure each of the outpost's defensive satellites and remain in proximity while our technicians activate them. A second squadron will oppose you.
This exercise will yield invaluable tactical data. Do not hold back or show mercy. You'll only skew the results.
Satellite weapons online! Targeting Republic starfighters. Stand down, squadron--victory is ours!
Satellite weapons online! The wargame is over, and victory is yours. Well done.
The Republic has activated the satellites! We must withdraw! Repeat, withdraw!
The opposing squadron has activated the satellites. The wargame is over, and you're dead. Something to learn from.
Secure each of the outpost's defensive satellites and stay in range until our technicians have captured their systems.
Imperial reinforcements are already inbound. They're going to try to activate the satellites for themselves--but they aren't counting on pilots like you!
Each squadron will send fighters toward the satellites. Stay in range and intercept all foes while a satellite powers up.
Your performance today will mean lives saved tomorrow. Fly your best, and may the Force be with us.
Defense network fully powered and under control. Good work, squadron--now watch those Imps run!
Well played, squadron--the defense network is yours, thanks to teamwork and tactics.
The Imps have taken the defense network. Retreat! We'll fight another day.
The defense network has fallen to the enemy. Good fight, but it wasn't your day.
Satellite A captured!
We've taken Satellite B!
Satellite C is ours!
We've lost Satellite A!
Enemy just took Satellite B!
The enemy captured Satellite C!
We have taken Satellite A.
Satellite B secured.
Satellite C is under our control.
Satellite A has fallen to the enemy.
We have lost Satellite B.
The enemy has taken Satellite C.
